      • swipe

        public void swipe(AppiumDriver<?> driver,
                  MobileElement element,
                  int offset1,
                  int offset2,
                  int duration)
           throws IllegalCoordinatesException
        Deprecated. 
        Creates the swiping action. It is supposed to be performed inside the given element.
        Parameters:
        driver - an instance that extends AppiumDriver
        element - the element that is going to be swiped
        offset1 - from the first (starting) element board
        offset2 - from the ending element board
        duration - in milliseconds
        Throws:
        IllegalCoordinatesException - when starting/ending coordinates are outside of the given element
